channel.title: Few Demise Source [ Delta ] problems
channel.description: delta source. I followed a simple tut to add in npc's, then i compiled and ran and this came up: "Exception in "main" java.lang.ArrayOutOfBoundsException : 8 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn<NPCHandler.java:2061> at NPCHandler.<init><NPCHandler.java:560> at server.main<server.java:124>" i also went through the client.java and replaced all the "demise" with the name of my server. When i load up client, I log in but the screen and minimap is black. Any help is appreciated. :)

item.title: Few Demise Source [ Delta ] problems
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

usman, what spaces? and i just found a command to spawn an npc…
EDIT: I deleted my additions to the cfg files, but still get that error??
EDIT2: will making all the .cfg files the same work? or should i put them all together, remove the repeated ones, and then put just one? and for the later, should i jsut place them into client/config? NOTE There are 3 files of each .cfg, and they are NOT identical. ( some have entries that others dont have)

Read full topic

item.title: Few Demise Source [ Delta ] problems
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:9, topic:366899”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=463096.msg3387320#msg3387320 date=1288572915]
You might be right. The problem with that is that the fact that the server doesn’t know which one to read. That is unless I’m getting you right; if your talking about three Autospawn.cfg. Then that might be the problem.
[/quote]Are you blind? There are spaces everywhere.[/quote]
Quite aware.
I’m talking about how they are spaced.

Read full topic

most likely, can u think of a fix?
